    • validateEnvelopedSignature

      public XMLObjectWrapper validateEnvelopedSignature(XMLObjectWrapper parent, Element element, XMLSignatureWrapper signature, String id) throws IOException
      Verifies an enveloped signed message and returns the signed data.
      Parameters:
      parent - The enveloped signed XML object.
      element - The actual element (null implies root).
      signature - The enveloped signature.
      id - The mandatory ID element.
      Returns:
      XML document "as-is").
      Throws:
      IOException - If anything unexpected happens...

      Returns:
